sentences.sContent: So when you go from head to toe, you're seeing a mosaic creature that is neither chimpanzee, nor is it human.
sentences.sContent_eng: So when you go from head to toe, you're seeing a mosaic creature that is neither chimpanzee, nor is it human.
sentences.sCn: 所以从头到脚，让人看到的是一个在黑猩猩和人类之间模棱两可的生物，这就是始祖地人猿。

sentences.sContent: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.sContent_eng: By hunting or gathering away from the group, both chimpanzee and dolphin moms ensure that what they find goes to their young.
sentences.sCn: 黑猩猩和海豚妈妈们远离群体打猎和收集食物，并保证他们所找到的食物都给孩子们。

sentences.sContent: It was, if I can give a chimpanzee language, I can empty the contents of his mind. He can tell me what he's thinking, how he sees the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was, if I can give a chimpanzee language, I can empty the contents of his mind. He can tell me what he's thinking, how he sees the world.
sentences.sCn: 他的想法是，如果我能交给黑猩猩一种语言的话，我就可以掏空他的想法，他可以告诉我他在想什么，他是怎样看这个世界的。

trans.tranOther: an intelligent African animal that is like a large monkey without a tail
